The '''Google Nexus''', '''Nexus family''' or '''Nexus brand''' is a line of [[Android (operating system)|Android]] smartphones produced by [[Google]] in co-operation with selected hardware companies. The purpose of the Nexus phones is to offer a "pure Android experience", were the phones come SIM-free and with the unlocked bootloader, making them ideal for software developers.
+
The '''Google Nexus''', '''Nexus family''' or '''Nexus brand''' is a line of [[Android (operating system)|Android]] smartphones produced by [[Google]] in co-operation with selected hardware companies. The purpose of the Nexus phones is to offer a "pure Android experience", were the phones come SIM-free and with the unlocked bootloader, making them ideal for software developers. Nexus phones are widely considered the "flasgship" of the Android devices.<ref>http://gizmodo.com/5851133/samsung-galaxy-nexus-the-greatest-androids-got-a-720p-super-amoled-display</ref>
== Nexus One ==
